title: January 2023 - Now
items: Use of the Django Framework to develop APIs, scripts and services
Automated tests with the Pytest library

title: May 2022 - December 2022
items: Use of the Django Framework to develop APIs, scripts and services
Automated tests with the Pytest library
Data scraping with Beautiful Soup and Selenium
AWS Infrastructure (Lambda, CloudFormation, SQS, Cloudwatch, S3, EC2, RDS, DynamoDB, Secrets Manager...)

title: July 2021 - December 2021
items: Use of the Android Framework (Java) to develop mobile applications for memory and cognitive training of elderly people, children and people who experienced trauma. The work required the use of web services and handling SQLite databases

title: June 2020 - July 2020
items: Math tutor of CentraleSupélec Summer Math School, a preparatory course for incoming international students of CentraleSupélec
This course aims to provide to the students the basic mathematical background required by CentraleSupélec graduation subjects
Classes mainly in French (sometimes English was necessary to make some points clear)
Course content: reasoning and logic, set theory, functions, sequences and series of functions, linear algebra, topology

title: February 2018 - June 2018
items: Tutor of the Solid Mechanics course for the students of computing engineering
Weekly sessions open to students questions and doubts
